name: HeartAndLungTransplants
title: Heart and Lung Transplants
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for heart and lung transplant procedures),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent heart and lung transplants),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
